subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Agent Scott Boras announced that outfielder J.D. Drew had finally agreed to a five-year, $70 million contract with the Boston Red Sox, but was not as forthcoming about pitcher Barry Zito.
snippet: Agent Scott Boras announced that outfielder J.D. Drew had finally agreed to a five-year, $70 million contract with the Boston Red Sox, but was not as forthcoming about pitcher Barry Zito.
